sections.heading: of lands; owner's contract with agent or broker; when void
sections.text: Every contract for the sale of lands between the owner thereof and any broker or agent employed to sell the same, shall be void, unless the contract is in writing and subscribed by the owner of the land and the broker or agent. Such contract

sections.heading: not intended to apply to a sale made by the owner directly to a real estate agent. Waters v. Phelps, 81 Neb. 674, 116 N.W. 783 (1908).
sections.text: not intended to apply to a sale made by the owner directly to a real estate agent. Waters v. Phelps, 81 Neb. 674, 116 N.W. 783 (1908).

sections.heading: constitutional. Baker v. Gillan, 68 Neb. 368, 94 N.W. 615 (1903).
sections.text: constitutional. Baker v. Gillan, 68 Neb. 368, 94 N.W. 615 (1903).
